Author: cmendibl3
Summary: Add-AzureRmAnalysisServicesFirewallRule is a small powershell script that uses the the Set-AzureRmResource cmdlet to dd firewall rules to an Azure Analysis Service instance.Once you run it, the script will ask you for:The resource group name where the Analysis Service is deployed
Title: Add-AzureRmAnalysisServicesFirewallRule
